import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import "./login.scss" import { useContext } from "react"; import { AuthContext } from "../../context/authContext"; const Login = () => { const {login} = useContext(AuthContext); //Arrow function for current user login const handleLogin = () => { login(); } return (
